[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] This is a little QoL mod that displays explosion radius on all explosives on selection and placing.
I would expect it to be compatible with most mods. However it doesn't quite work with Combat Extended yet.
Feedback is welcome. Please leave a comment if you spot any issues or have any suggestions! Hope you like it.
[url=https://github.com/colinfang/ExplosiveRadius][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url]

[*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting.
